precedent.body: Multiple attacks, and the monster's effects being negated while attacking

en.answer:
If you declare a second etc. attack due to the effect of Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation, and its effects are negated during the Battle Step, it will no longer be possible to continue that attack, or to make additional attacks.

Furthermore, if the effects of Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation which is attacking for the second (or more) time are negated during the Damage Step by Forbidden Droplet, damage calculation will be conducted for that attack normally.

~~~

This also applies to the following monsters, whose Continuous Effects allow them to attack multiple times.

Monsters that『can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each:』
● Asura Priest
● Ultimate Conductor Tyranno
● Ultimate Tyranno
● Ancient Gear Hydra
● Ally of Justice Thousand Arms
● Grasschopper
● Machine Lord Ür
● King Beast Barbaros
● Jurrac Monoloph
● Drytron Meteonis Draconids
● Elemental HERO Wildedge
● Super Vehicroid - Stealth Union
● World Chalice Guardragon Almarduke
● Tyrant Burst Dragon
● Blue-Eyes Tyrant Dragon
● Stardust Charge Warrior
● Number 5: Doom Chimera Dragon
● Borrelend Dragon
● Bujintei Susanowo
● Raidraptor - Rise Falcon
● An Xyz Monster Xyz Summoned using Digital Bug Centibit

Monsters that『can make a second attack during each Battle Phase:』
● Amazoness Augusta
● Ancient Gear Reactor Dragon
● Exosisters Magnifica
● Elemental HERO Neos Knight
● Number C43: High Manipulator of Chaos
● Bloom Prima the Melodious Choir
● Gilti-Gearfried the Magical Steel Knight
● Fossil Warrior Skull King
● Cyber Twin Dragon
● The Tripper Mercury
● Gem-Knight Topaz
● Zerrziel, Ruler of the Evil Eyed
● Twinheaded Beast
● Frightfur Kraken
● Hi-Speedroid Chanbara
● Odd-Eyes Raging Dragon
● Ruin, Supreme Queen of Oblivion
● Hayabusa Knight
● Battlewasp - Hama the Conquering Bow
● Battlewasp - Twinbow the Attacker
● Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast
● Mermaid Knight
● Lunalight Leo Dancer

Monsters that『can make up to 3 attacks during each Battle Phase:』
● Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth
● Vision HERO Trinity
● Odd-Eyes Rebellion Dragon Overlord

Other monsters that can attack multiple time due to their Continuous Effects:
● Frightfur Wolf
● Ancient Gear Megaton Golem
● Cyberdark End Dragon
● Shooting Quasar Dragon
● Mannadium Prime-Heart
● Raidraptor - Arsenal Falcon
● Lyrilusc - Assembled Nightingale
● Ashura King
● Varar, Vaalmonican Concord
en.question:
I control Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation, whose『this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each』effect is applying. I now declare its second (or more) attack during the current Battle Phase. In response to the attack declaration, or otherwise during the Battle Step, Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation's effects become negated. What happens to the ongoing attack??

Furthermore, what happens if, instead, Mementoal Tecuhtlica - Combined Creation's effects become negated during the Damage Step, such as due to a card like Forbidden Droplet?
en.title: What happens if a monster can attack multiple times due to a Continuous Effect, and, during such an attack, its effects become negated?

ja.question:
『①：自分フィールドに他のモンスターが存在しない場合、このカードは相手モンスター全てに１回ずつ攻撃できる』永続効果を適用している「<<19360>>」の２回目以降の攻撃宣言時（もしくはそのバトルステップ中）に、他の効果が適用されて永続効果が無効化された場合、その攻撃はどうなりますか？

また、「<<19360>>」の２回目以降の攻撃のダメージステップ中に「<<15299>>」等の効果が適用され、永続効果が無効化された場合、その攻撃はどうなりますか？
ja.title: 永続効果によって複数回攻撃できるモンスターの２回目以降の攻撃時に、効果が無効化された場合、その攻撃はどうなりますか？
